document.full_text: bahrain's interior minister said on tuesday security forces had not targeted any sect after recent unrest, rejecting opposition complaints the sunni-led state has subjected majority shi'ites to abuse.
document.title: bahrain not targeting any religious sect: minister
lines_and_colors: bahrain's interior minister said on tuesday security forces had not targeted any sect after recent unrest, rejecting opposition complaints the sunni-led state has subjected majority shi'ites to abuse.
